about_the_game:
Welcome to the small quiet town of Kettle Rock, cradled in the middle of nowhere in rural Idaho. This once prosperous town has now diminished to an almost-abandoned state, and it is here that Detective Lupe, a well-traversed investigator, finds themselves stranded by coincidence. While awaiting for assistance, they meet Sheriff Misra, a rookie officer within the Kettle Rock's Precinct. Lupe offers guidance in what seems like a simple break-in case at the abandoned Winery, but the mystery soon reveals a much more sinister secret within the town’s history. However, something lingers in the back of Lupe’s mind. Could it be feelings for their new partner in crime-solving? Or maybe an odd case of Deja Vu?

MEET THE ROOKIE is an exploration game focused on a mysterious narrative. Traverse the town, and meet a cast of mysterious characters. Lupe and Misra must work together to solve the mystery of the Kettle Rock Winery before it’s too late.

content_descriptors.notes: Our game contains cult themes and pixelated fantasy violence & gore.

detailed_description:
Welcome to the small quiet town of Kettle Rock, cradled in the middle of nowhere in rural Idaho. This once prosperous town has now diminished to an almost-abandoned state, and it is here that Detective Lupe, a well-traversed investigator, finds themselves stranded by coincidence. While awaiting for assistance, they meet Sheriff Misra, a rookie officer within the Kettle Rock's Precinct. Lupe offers guidance in what seems like a simple break-in case at the abandoned Winery, but the mystery soon reveals a much more sinister secret within the town’s history. However, something lingers in the back of Lupe’s mind. Could it be feelings for their new partner in crime-solving? Or maybe an odd case of Deja Vu?

MEET THE ROOKIE is an exploration game focused on a mysterious narrative. Traverse the town, and meet a cast of mysterious characters. Lupe and Misra must work together to solve the mystery of the Kettle Rock Winery before it’s too late.
name: Meet the Rookie

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-549 or AMD Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 235 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT, 512 MB or AMD Radeon HD 9570, 1GB
  • Storage: 386 MB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas lícitas
Atos criminosos

short_description: Explore the small town of Kettle Rock as Detective Lupe, alongside their unlikely partner Sheriff Misra, to solve the case of a mysterious Winery. But things are not as they seem, as something much more sinister lies behind the history of this town.
